name: Glassinput
tagline: InputMethodService for Google Glass on Android, allowing to navigate using the volume & menu/back buttons. See github.com/zhuowei/Xenologer
body:
GLASSInput
==========

InputMethodService for Google Glass on Android, allowing to navigate using the volume & menu/back buttons. See github.com/zhuowei/Xenologer
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
